metadata.Name: SQuAD
metadata.Description: SQuAD is a reading comprehension dataset, consisting of questions posed by crowdworkers on a set of Wikipedia articles, where the answer to every question is a segment of text, or span, from the corresponding reading passage.
metadata.Paper Title: SQuAD: 100,000+ Questions for Machine Comprehension of Text
metadata.Venue Name: Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
metadata.Abstract: We present SQuAD, a new reading comprehension dataset consisting of questions posed by crowdworkers on a set of Wikipedia articles, where the answer to every question is a segment of text, or span, from the corresponding reading passage. We also describe a novel approach to machine comprehension that combines information retrieval with machine learning, and achieve human-level performance on this dataset.
